home.hero-description: Protect your servers from raids, trolls and bad actors with ease – Server Guard has numerous features for moderating your server, such as our verification system.
home.cta-title: Ready to take your server's moderation to the next level?
home.cta-description: Don't delay any further! Invite our bot to your server today and start using it right away!
home.features-checkpoint-description: New users can be required to verify through our online web portal which offers a frictionless experience for users. Our checkpoint system will deter bots and prevent alts, while allowing legitimate users entry to your server!
home.features-raid-description: Automated accounts will not make it past our verification checkpoints while allowing legitimate users entry to enjoy your server! If we detect a suspected raid, our system can automatically activate stricter checkpoints.
home.features-info-description: Server Guard provides you with detailed information of any users in your server or who are verifying, giving you a score of a user based on various factors, including their social connections. We will also alert you if a user may be using a VPN.
home.features-automod-description: Our automated chat filters can greatly assist your server moderators by preventing toxicity, hate-speech, invite links, and more automatically without the need for their intervention. Rest assured, our filters rarely have false positives!
home.features-moderation-description: Our bot offers the capability to ban or mute users permanently or temporarily, and issue warnings to users that can be temporary and viewed by moderators, making moderation a breeze!
home.features-automations-description: Server administrators can figure automated actions to happen in response to various moderation events, such as reaching a certain number of warnings or accumulating too much heat from automod actions!
home.faq-verification-panel: Our verification system makes use of a web interface to verify that the user is not a previously banned user and that they are also a legitimate user.
home.faq-privacy: What kind of data does the bot store?
home.faq-privacy-panel: The bot stores only the data and identifiers it needs to provide its services.
home.faq-privacy-panel-2: Identifiers like IP addresses are securely hashed such that we cannot know the original IP address of the user.
home.faq-filters: How accurate are the toxicity and hate-speech filters?
home.faq-filters-panel: The toxicity and hate-speech filters are trained on a large dataset of text. They are highly accurate and can detect toxic and hateful content.
home.faq-credit-card: Do you store credit card information securely?
home.faq-credit-card-panel: Yes, we use Stripe to process payments. Your credit card information is never stored on our servers. We only use Stripe to process payments and to send you transactional emails. We never store your credit card information.
home.faq-support-panel: You can get support by opening a support ticket on our <support>Guilded server</support>.
home.faq-user-privacy: I'm a user, how do I know servers are respecting my privacy with the bot?
home.faq-user-privacy-panel: We make an effort to notify users of which features of our bot servers they are in use which log data in some form.
home.faq-user-privacy-panel-2: For example, the verification portal will tell the user if the server has features like message logging enabled, and we provide a /privacy command to see which features are enabled as well.

general.endorse-notice: Server Guard is not endorsed or created by Guilded

verify.intro: Welcome to {server}! This server is protected by Server Guard, please verify with us by clicking the button below.
verify.legal: By verifying with Server Guard, you agree with our <legal>Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions.</legal>

rejected.tor: This server does not permit verification via the TOR network
rejected.nsfw: Your profile or banner is too NSFW for this server
rejected.linked_account: Your account is linked to a previously banned user
rejected.toxicity: Your profile is too toxic for this server
rejected.hatespeech: Your profile contains too much hatespeech for this server
rejected.invalid_token: This code is invalid or expired, please generate another.

verify.success: Thanks for verifying, you can now enter the server!
verify.scamwarning: Server Guard will never ask you for personal information
verify.admin_contact: If you believe this was an error, contact <url>{admin_contact}</url>

legal.notice: Please be aware that only our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy in English are legally binding. While translations of these documents may be provided for your convenience, they are translated by the community and are thus not legal documents.

privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to Server Guard, and we take appropriate measures to protect your privacy while using our services.
privacy.verification: When your account is being verified with Server Guard, some information may be shared with the staff members of the servers using Server Guard. This includes, but is not limited to:
privacy.verification-username: The username on the service(s) you used to verify your account
privacy.verification-metrics: Metrics about the accounts from the service(s) you used to verify your account, these can include but are not limited to, the age of the account, or the amount of tweets you have posted.
privacy.verification-connection: Connection information, indicating whether you used a VPN when you verified with Server Guard.
privacy.hashing: Identifiers of your connection are irreversibly anonymized before storage using the SHA-512 hashing algorithm.
privacy.analytics: We collect analytical data for statistical and error reporting purposes, and the storing of configuration data necessary for the operation of our services. In addition, we may employ third-party integrations such as Google Analytics and Google AdSense for personalized advertisements, which make use of cookie technology to provide targeted advertisements. We attempt to store your data outside of public access, in as safe a manner as we can realistically guarantee. However, due to the very nature of online data transfer and storage, we may be unable to meet this expectation, due to the fact that complete security is not possible. Server Guard may be used by people not directly affiliated to us, and thus, we do not have any control over how they use our services, provided it is within reasonable terms.
privacy.agreement: Verification of your account using our services constitutes agreement to our policies on data collection. If you do not accept this agreement, you are to leave any servers using our services, and to never verify your account with our services. Not doing so will be regarded as accepting our policies.
privacy.filters: When you post, share, or otherwise transmit messages, or content in a server protected by Server Guard, we may collect those messages, and they may be filtered and moderated for purposes such as removal of profanity and other inappropriate content. Where permitted by law, we may use pre-filtered messages for purposes such as training and improving our filter technology to increase safety in servers using Server Guard.

terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service completely before using <website>https://serverguard.xyz</website> owned and operated by Reapimus. This agreement documents the legally binding terms and conditions attached to the use of the Site at serverguard.xyz. By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using these particular services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services. The Server Guard service is not accessible to those under 13 years of age, and Server Guard does not knowingly store personal information from children under the age of 13. Any participation in this service will constitute acceptance of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.liability-text: This site and it’s components are offered for informational purposes only; this site shall not be responsible or liable for the accuracy, usefulness or available of any information transmitted or made available via the site, and shall not be responsible or liable for any error or omissions in that information.
terms.ip-text: The Site and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Reapimus and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws. All data generated and shared by Server Guard in the past, present or future is property of Server Guard and it’s sole owners and must be transferred, removed or changed on request.
terms.termination-text: We may terminate your access to the Site, without cause or notice, which may result in the forfeiture and destruction of all information associated with your account. All provisions of this Agreement that, by their nature, should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability. You may also request to terminate your account yourself, to do this, submit a deletion request on our web panel. Using Server Guard after termination will result in a new account being opened for you.
terms.changes-text: Server Guard reserves the right to change these conditions from time to time as it sees fit and your continued use of the site will signify your acceptance of any adjustment to these terms.
terms.warranty-text: Server Guard is provided “as is” with no warranty or liability for any outcomes of using Server Guard and/or any content you may or may not interact with on Server Guard, and you agree that Server Guard is not liable for any events in the past, in current times or in the future. You agree to hold harmless against Server Guard for every possible situation except for those we accept full responsibility of. Server Guard is not responsible and will not take responsibility for the behaviour of other parties using Server Guard.
terms.disputes-text: While using Server Guard, certain situations may or may not develop which may cause you to file a dispute with us.
terms.disputes-text-2: If you find yourself banned from our services, you must contact us through our <support>support server</support> to file an official appeals, or to request the reason for your ban. Appeals must be formally written and should include your Guilded ID, proof of account ownership and a reason why your ban should be overturned.
terms.links-text: Our Site does contain a number of links to other websites and online resources that are not owned or controlled by Server Guard. Server Guard has no control over, and therefor cannot assume responsibility for, the content or general practices of any of these third part sites and/or services. Therefore, we strongly advise you to read the entire terms and conditions and privacy policy of any site that you visit as a result of following a link that is posted on our site.
terms.law-text: This Agreement is governed in accordance with the laws of New South Wales.
terms.acknowledgement-text: By using Server Guard, you acknowledge all above Terms. You acknowledge that, even if you did not read the Terms in full, you will comply with our Terms.
terms.contact-text: If you have any questions, requests or complaints about Server Guard, please forward this to our staff using our <support>support server</support>. We will respond to these inquiries within 28 days. Server Guard fully complies with GDPR Data Releasements and Data Deletion.

silence_commands.label: Silence Commands
silence_commands.description: Remove the message when a moderator uses a command

roles.label: Log Role Changes
roles.description: When enabled, logs role changes to User Logs

messages.label: Message Logs Channel
messages.description: Logs channel for any kind of message

traffic.label: Traffic Logs Channel
traffic.description: Logs channel for when users join/leave or are banned

users.label: User Logs Channel
users.description: Logs channel for user-related changes like roles

management.label: Management Logs Channel
management.description: Logs channel for things like channel creation

actions.label: Action Logs Channel
actions.description: Logs channel for actions like bans or kicks

nsfw.label: NSFW Logs Channel
nsfw.description: Logs channel for the bot's NSFW detection

remove_old.label: Remove Old Level Roles
remove_old.description: When a user gains a level, the bot will try to remove any known previous level roles

announce_level_up.label: Announce Level Up
announce_level_up.description: Announces that the user leveled up, in the channel where they leveled up from

xp_gain.label: Role XP Gain
xp_gain.description: Grant certain roles (or everyone) XP when they speak. Limits XP gains to once per minute

logs.label: Automod Logs
logs.description: Where automoderation logs will be sent to

malicious_urls.label: Block Malicious URLs
malicious_urls.description: Filters out known malicious URLs from a public database

api_keys.label: Block API Keys
api_keys.description: Blocks Detected API keys leaked in messages

mass_mentions.label: Block Mass Mentions
mass_mentions.description: Blocks messages with more than 6 mentions in them

spam.label: Spam
spam.description: How many messages must be sent within 3 seconds of each other to trigger the spam filter

toxicity.label: Toxicity Filter
toxicity.description: How certain the bot must be of a toxicity detection to act on it

hate-speech.label: Hate-speech Filter
hate-speech.description: How certain the bot must be of a hate-speech detection to act on it

nsfw.label: NSFW Filter
nsfw.description: How certain the bot must be of a NSFW detection to act on it

blacklist.label: Word Blacklist
blacklist.description: Blacklist words in messages, automatically detects potential variants of listed words

default_profanities.label: Default Profanity Lists
default_profanities.description: Which languages to apply a default profanity list for if detected in a message

untrusted_block_attachments.label: Untrusted Block Attachments
untrusted_block_attachments.description: What types of attachments the bot should block from users you consider untrusted.

welcome.title: Welcome Message
welcome.enabled_description: Whether or not the bot will welcome users
welcome.channel_description: The channel to welcome users in
welcome.image_description: URL(s) to images for the welcome message to use

goodbye.title: Goodbye Message
goodbye.enabled_description: Whether or not the bot will say goodbye to users
goodbye.channel_description: The channel to say goodbye in
goodbye.image_description: URL(s) to images for the goodbye message to use

welcomer_cycle.label: Cycle
welcomer_cycle.description: How should the welcomer cycle through images?

welcomer.templates_note: Welcomer messages support the following template strings:

feeds.title: RSS Feeds
feeds.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this feed?

source.label: Source
source.description: What this feed should post to

feed.label: Feed
feed.description: Where this feed pulls RSS data from

url.label: URL
url.description: The URL of your custom feed

feeds.channel_description: The channel this feed will post to
feeds.webhook_description: The webhook this feed will post to

feed_dead.tooltip: The feed at this URL is no longer in service.
feed_dead.title: Feed no longer available
feed_dead.description: The provider for the feed at this URL has indicated that they no longer intend to offer this feed. Please change the source or delete this feed.

giveaways.title: Giveaways

role.label: Ping Role
role.description: The role that will be pinged when a giveaway is hosted

channel.label: Giveaway Channel
channel.description: The channel all giveaways will be posted in

winners.label: Winners
winners.description: How many entrants can win this giveaway

giveaways.channel_description: The channel this giveaway will be posted in

verified_role.label: Verified Role
verified_role.description: The role that will be added to verified users

unverified_role.label: Unverified Role
unverified_role.description: The role that will be added to unverified users

channel.label: Verification Channel
channel.description: Where new users will be directed towards for verification

logs.label: Verify Logs
logs.description: Where logs for verified users will be sent to

admin_contact.label: Admin Contact
admin_contact.description: How users should contact you if something goes wrong during verification

block_tor.label: Block TOR Exit Nodes
block_tor.description: When enabled, Server Guard will block any verification attempts from the TOR network

proxy_check.label: Proxy Check
proxy_check.description: When enabled, Server Guard will block verification attempts from dangerous IPs

raid_guard.label: Raid Guard
raid_guard.description: Raid Guard attempts to automatically block and intercept raid attempts

rule_enforcement.label: Rule Enforcement
rule_enforcement.description: Server Guard will automatically reject verification based on these rules

nsfw.label: NSFW
nsfw.description: How certain the bot needs to be of NSFW in the user's Avatar or Banner to flag them

blacklist.label: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Words to blacklist in users' names or bios

language.label: Language
language.description: The language that things like logs will be outputted in

muted_role.label: Muted Role
muted_role.description: The role that will be added to muted users

prefix.label: Prefix
prefix.description: The prefix that will be used for commands

verification.name: Verification
verification.description: Protect your server from raids, ban evaders & more

logging.name: Logging
logging.description: Log all actions in your server

moderation.name: Moderation
moderation.description: Moderate your server with tools like temp bans, mutes & more

automod.name: Automod
automod.description: Automatically moderate messages in your server

xp.name: XP
xp.description: Level up announcements, XP gain & more

feeds.name: RSS Feeds
feeds.description: Automatically send news from RSS feeds right to your server

welcomer.name: Welcomer
welcomer.description: Welcome new members to your server

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.message: You have unsaved changes. Apply them to keep them!

failed.title: Failed
failed.message_cors: An unexpected CORS error has occurred.
failed.message_server: An unexpected server error has occurred.
